items.english: I can speak Sissali a little
Could you write that down for me?
I want to go shopping before watching the movie
I'll watch a movie after going shopping
I don;t have to go until tomorrow
This is my first time here
At what time does it start?
How many days would it take?
Can you show me where it is on the map?
I'd like to get off here at...?
How long is a trip to...?
I'd like to hire a car
Do you have a room for tonight?
we've booked a room in the name of...
Can I leave my bags here?
I want a room with a good view
is there a message for me?
I left my key in the room
Can I do money exchange here?
Can I have an extra bed?
How much is an extra bed per night?
Can you call a taxi for me?
I'd like a table for two please
Can I have a drink menu?
Can I have the bill please
Can you write down the price?
Can I have this in size...?
Can I have a bag please?
Do I have to pay to get in?
How many are you in your family?
Would you like to something together?
Would you like to go for a walk with me?
Would you like to watch a movie?
Can I buy you a drink?
Do you mind if sit here(to join someone)
I won't do it without a condom
Will you go out with me?
I don't think it is working out
I don't want to see you again
Do you have a pain killer?
I have run out of medication
I need a doctor who can speak Sissali
